data.message: How does one contact Facebook DIRECTLY, because I feel that the "Help Support" are not Real People, but  in reality are Automated Pre-Programed Artificial Intelligence.

replies.message: Hi Chance, how can we help assist you? -Meagan
Facebook Well, I made this page https://www.facebook.com/WeWantOldSearchBack/ OVER 200 PEOPLE agree with me, what does it take to get our voices across?

Facebook(null) Your Facebook browser that is used to open articles constantly fails to load the article properly (stalls) or shuts down FB while I'm reading the article.  It does it on my 3 year old iPad and it does it on my wife's new iPad.  It does not do this on my android smart phone.  Please address this in your weekly updates.

Hi Pete! If something's not working on Facebook, please follow the instructions below to let us know more. These instructions will show you how to report a problem directly from the page you're seeing it on. https://www.facebook.com/help/326603310765065/. Have a good day! -Meagan
Hi Facebook, please read a private message.

Hi Chance! Your suggestions and ideas are important to us. With over a billion people on Facebook, feedback from community members like you helps us to constantly improve our features and services. Though we can't respond to everyone who submits feedback, we review many of the ideas people send us and use them to improve the Facebook experience for everyone. Use the links below to give us feedback about how a Facebook feature works. Have an awesome day! -Meagan 
https://www.facebook.com/help/contact/268228883256323.
YEA CONTACTING FACEBOOK FOR HELP IS LIKE TALKING TO A WALL. THEY put a service up but don't police it or manage it. They profit by allow terrorists to utilize their product....so sad.
I can't put my PIN number I and can't put F on my phone the app !
